experience.title: Research Intern
experience.description: •Performed a case study on Operation Karuna to study how GIS helped in flood response and disaster management•Have gone through several theses to gain knowledge about the disaster that helped in finding optimum shelter locations•Collected relevant information on Kerala Floods (2018) that helped in the efficient planning of rescue operation•Organized necessary paperwork in the form of a formal presentation that included research scope documentation•Successfully learned about the specific features of the QGIS software and applied it to visualize flood inundation
